content.text: Bivall were a sentient species from the planet Protobranch.
Bivall were humanoid in form with blue/maroon skin. Members of the species had a slender body, a long thin neck and a crested head with eye stalks.

Bivall were known to have taken both Republic and Separatist sides. Dr. Sionver Boll was an alien scientist working for the Republic (performing research on the Zillo Beast), while Okalin was the royal advisor of King Sanjay Rash, the selfish and arrogant ruler of Onderon.
